doc:
Patrick Hines https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Patrick_Hines 0 Patrick Hines (March 17, 1930 in Burkeville, Texas – August 12, 1985 in Manhattan, New York), born Mainer Patrick Hines, was an American actor who was probably best known for his portrayal of Kapellmeister Giuseppe Bonno in the 1984 film Amadeus. He also appeared as Samuel Chase in the film 1776. Other films include The Brinks Job, Bloodrage and A Passage to India. Patrick_Hines ( March_17_,_1930 in Burkeville , Texas – August_12_,_1985 in Manhattan , New_York ) , born Mainer_Patrick_Hines , was an_American_actor who was_probably_best_known for his_portrayal of Kapellmeister_Giuseppe_Bonno in the_1984_film_Amadeus . He also appeared as Samuel_Chase in the_film_1776 . Other_films include The_Brinks_Job , Bloodrage and A_Passage to India .
